problem.markdown:
>>The dialysate rate depends on<< ( ) Blood flow rate ( ) Pressure ( ) Patient Clinical history ( ) All of the above
>>Rinsing of the hemodialysis machine during pre and post treatment is done by the solution<< ( ) Distilled water ( ) Bicarbonate solution ( ) Concentrated H2 SO4 ( ) a and b
>>The mesh like material used for filtration inside the dialyzer is known as<< ( ) Fiber sheath ( ) Semi permeable membrane ( ) Blood filter membrane ( ) All of the above
>>The anti-clotting agent is hemodialyser is<< ( ) Augmentin ( ) Heparin ( ) H2O ( ) HCL
>>The function of the kidney is<< ( ) Excretion of unwanted substances ( ) Purification of the blood ( ) Balancing the substances in the blood ( ) All of the above
problem.p: Rinsing of the hemodialysis machine during pre and post treatment is done by the solution
